Room.Name: Jungle Cemetery
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small cemetery in the jungle, near a freshly opened grave.
Room.LongDescription: A coffin has been pulled from the ground and hacked open, the wreckage strewn under the large trees. The ground is still steaming, and a freshly killed chicken lies on top of the casket, its blood used to write unusual symbols there. A string of chicken entrails look to be carefully placed in a circle around the wooden casket, and a single candle still burns atop it. Thick jungle brush separates you from an area where you hear chanting.
